verses.verse: Now these are the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3240>left,<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3045>them,<s%> even as many as had not known all the <S%H4421>wars<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>

only <S%H7535>that<s%> the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> might <S%H3045>know,<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> them <S%H4421>war,<s%> at the least such as <S%H6440>before<s%> knew nothing of <S%H3045>it:<s%>

the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and all the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> Baal <S%H1179>Hermon<s%> to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

They were left to <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by <S%H3045>them,<s%> to know whether they would <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites:<s%>

and they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> their own <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals<s%> and the <S%H842>Asheroth.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of Cushan <S%H3573>Rishathaim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> Cushan <S%H3573>Rishathaim<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

When the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>savior<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H6274>them,<s%> even Othniel the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came on <S%H8199>him,<s%> and he judged <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> Cushan <S%H3573>Rishathaim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> against Cushan <S%H3573>Rishathaim.<s%>
The <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because they had <S%H6213>done<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H622>gathered<s%> to him the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek;<s%> and he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

But when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> raised them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>savior,<s%> <S%H164>Ehud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> the <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H334>left-handed.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%> by <S%H3027>him<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

<S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H2719>sword<s%> which had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6366>edges,<s%> a <S%H1574>cubit<s%> in <S%H753>length;<s%> and he <S%H2296>wore<s%> it under his <S%H4055>clothing<s%> on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>
He <S%H7126>offered<s%> the <S%H4503>tribute<s%> to <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> now <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
When he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H7126>offering<s%> the <S%H4503>tribute,<s%> he sent <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H4503>tribute.<s%>

But he himself turned <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H6456>quarries<s%> that were by <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have a <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H1697>errand<s%> to <S%H4428>you,<s%> king." The king <S%H559>said,<s%> "Keep <S%H2013>silence!<s%>" All who <S%H5975>stood<s%> by him went out from <S%H3318>him.<s%>

<S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3427>him;<s%> and he was sitting by himself alone in the <S%H4747>cool<s%> upper <S%H5944>room.<s%> <S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have a <S%H1697>message<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6965>you.<s%>" He arose out of his <S%H3678>seat.<s%>

<S%H164>Ehud<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> from his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H8628>thrust<s%> it into his <S%H990>body:<s%>

and the <S%H5325>handle<s%> also went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3851>blade;<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5462>closed<s%> <S%H1157>on<s%> the <S%H3851>blade,<s%> for he <S%H8025>didn't<s%> draw the <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H990>body;<s%> and <S%H6574>it<s%> came out <S%H3318>behind.<s%>
Then <S%H164>Ehud<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H4528>porch,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the upper <S%H5944>room<s%> on <S%H5274>him,<s%> and locked them.

Now when he was gone <S%H3318>out,<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and they <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H1817>behold,<s%> the doors of the upper <S%H5944>room<s%> were <S%H5274>locked;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Surely he is <S%H5526>covering<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H4747>upper<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%>"

They <S%H2342>waited<s%> until they were <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> and <S%H6605>behold,<s%> he didn't open the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the upper <S%H5944>room:<s%> therefore they <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4668>key,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H113>them,<s%> and behold, their lord was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
<S%H164>Ehud<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> while they <S%H4102>waited,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6456>quarries,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> to <S%H8167>Seirah.<s%>

It <S%H935>happened,<s%> when he had come, that he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> with him from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H6440>country,<s%> and he before them.

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7291>them,<s%> "Follow <S%H310>me;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" They <S%H3381>followed<s%> <S%H310>him,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> and <S%H5414>didn't<s%> allow any <S%H376>man<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over.<s%>

They <S%H5221>struck<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> every <S%H8082>lusty<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and every man of <S%H2428>valor;<s%> and there <S%H4422>escaped<s%> not a <S%H376>man.<s%>

So <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> him was <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath,<s%> who <S%H5221>struck<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with an <S%H1241>ox<s%> - <S%H4451>goad:<s%> and he also <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
